rotate_rotation_bar.description: Rotate the bar to adjust the direction of the lamp.

slide_translation_bar.description: Slide the translation bar to adjust the height of the lamp.

rotate_head.description: Rotate the lamp head to change the lighting direction.

rotate_fastener.description: Tighten or loosen the fastener to secure the lamp in a desired position.

clean_lamp.description: Clean the entire lamp including the lamp base, rotation bar, translation bar, head, and fastener.

check_lamp.description: Check whether the lamp is in proper alignment by closely observing each part.
